metadata.title: CVE-2023-0518 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 14.0 before 15.6.7, all versions starting from 15.7 before15.7.6, all versions starting from 15.8 before 15.8.1. It was possible totrigger a DoS attack by uploading a malicious Helm chart.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
